elements.name: gigya-screen-set
elements.description: A collection of user interaction screens within a div element.

classes.gigya-calculate-size: CSS class to apply to the screen-set for responsive design.
classes.gigya-screen-dialog: CSS class that is applied to the screen-set when presented in a dialog.
classes.gigya-screen-dialog-mobile: CSS class that is applied to the screen-set when presented in a dialog on mobile devices.
classes.gigya-hidden: CSS class that is applied to to the screen-set when hidden.

id.description: A unique identifier for the screen-set.

data-responsive.description: Enables responsive design for the screen-set.

data-width.description: Defines the width of the screen-set when presented in a dialog.

data-height.description: Defines the height of the screen-set when presented in a dialog.

data-start-screen.description: Specifies the initial screen to display within the screen-set.

data-dialog-style.description: Style of the dialog when the screen-set is presented in a dialog.

elements.name: gigya-screen
elements.description: Individual screens encapsulated within a div element, part of a gigya-screen-set.

classes.gigya-hidden: CSS class that is applied to the screen when hidden.

id.description: A unique identifier for the screen.

data-width.description: Defines the width of the screen.

data-height.description: Defines the height of the screen.

data-next-screen.description: Specifies the next screen to display upon completion of the current screen.

data-on-accounts-linked-screen.description: Specifies the screen to display upon completion of account linking.

data-on-pending-tfa-registration-screen.description: Specifies the screen to display when a pending TFA registration is triggered during registration or login.

data-on-pending-registration-screen.description: Specifies the screen to display when a pending registration is triggered during registration or login.

data-on-existing-login-identifier-screen.description: Specifies the screen to display when a conflicting login identifier is detected during social login.

data-on-pending-verification-screen.description: Specifies the screen to display when a pending verification is triggered during registration or login.

data-on-pending-tfa-verification-screen.description: Specifies the screen to display when a pending TFA is triggered during registration or login.

data-on-pending-email-verification-code.description: Specifies the screen to display when a  code is sent to the user's email for verification.

data-on-missing-loginid-screen.description: Specifies the screen to display when a password required during password-less registration ( social login, otp ,fido, etc).

data-on-pending-password-change-screen.description: Specifies the screen to display when a pending password change is triggered.

data-on-pending-recent-login-screen.description: Specifies the screen to display when a pending recent login is triggered.

data-on-.*-screen.description: Specifies the screen to display upon completion of a specific event.

gigya-conditional:.*.description: A conditional attribute for setting how screens appear on various screen sizes.

expression.description: The input for the conditional attribute.

operator.description: The operator to use for the conditional attribute.

true_value.description: The operator to use for the conditional attribute.

oneOf.description: The value to use if the condition is false.
If the condition is false, the attribute will be reverted to it's initial or deleted if no initial value.

elements.name: form
elements.description: Utilizes form tags for functionality of updating profile fields.

elements.name: field
elements.description: Input fields within forms, such as text inputs, checkboxes, etc.

attributes.name: data-bound-to
attributes.description: Binds a field to a specific profile attribute, such as loginID, email, etc.

types.name: gigya-social-login
types.description: A wrapper around SAP Customer Data Cloud's Login plugin.

attributes.name: showTermsLink
attributes.description: Whether to show the terms link.

types.name: gigya-captcha
types.description: A CAPTCHA component using Google's reCAPTCHA.

attributes.name: data-badge
attributes.description: Position of the Invisible reCAPTCHA badge.

types.name: gigya-password-strength
types.description: Provides an indication of password strength.

attributes.name: data-on-focus-bubble
attributes.description: Display the widget in a floating bubble on focus.

attributes.name: data-bubble-orientation
attributes.description: Orientation of the bubble (right, left, up, down).

elements.name: event
elements.description: Supports global and screen-set specific events for custom logic and integration.

attributes.name: onLogin
attributes.description: Global event triggered upon user login.

attributes.name: onBeforeSubmit
attributes.description: Screen-set specific event triggered before form submission.

attributes.name: onAfterSubmit
attributes.description: Screen-set specific event triggered after form submission.

elements.name: gigya-error-display
elements.description: Indicates an element bound to an error state of a form or field.

attributes.name: data-bound-to
attributes.description: Indicates the object to which this error object is bound.

attributes.name: data-scope
attributes.description: Indicates the scope of this error object.

attributes.name: data-error-codes
attributes.description: List of error codes for which the error object will be displayed.

elements.name: gigya-error-msg
elements.description: Container for automatically generated error messages.

attributes.name: data-scope
attributes.description: Attribute indicating the scope of this error object.

attributes.name: data-error-codes
attributes.description: List of error codes for which the error container will be displayed.

data-switch-screen.description: Specifies the screen to switch to upon interaction.
